question: A farmer is planting trees in rows. He plants apple trees every 5 metres and orange trees every 7 metres. If he plants both types of trees at the start of a row, at what distance will the next pair of apple and orange trees be planted together?

In a dance competition, routines A and B have different cycle times. Routine A repeats every 10 minutes, and Routine B repeats every 14 minutes. If both routines start at 9:00 AM, when will they both be on stage at the same time again?

Two friends, Maria and John, start jogging around a track. Maria completes a lap every 9 minutes, and John completes a lap every 12 minutes. If they both start at the same point and time, after how many minutes will they meet at the starting point again?

Two buses leave a station at the same time. Bus A returns to the station every 15 minutes, and Bus B returns every 20 minutes. How long will it be until both buses are back at the station at the same time?

A digital billboard displays advertisements for two products. Ad A is shown every 25 seconds, and Ad B is shown every 30 seconds. If both ads are displayed at 1:00 PM, after how many seconds will they both be displayed together again?
